name: Sofia
greetingText: I am glad to meet the most beautiful you in the most beautiful time
textInChatBox: 首先非常高兴能够认识你
text3: 我想了很久，认为这是一个不错的想法
text4: We are not far apart, but we are in two countries
text4Adjective: 所以我制作了这个动画把玫瑰送给你
wishHeading: 说你也没收到过花，于是我决定这么做
outroText: I hope you enjoyed this little surprise!!
replayText: 如果你喜欢，你可以再看一遍，哈哈哈
